steps.name: Given I have created an instance of the CustomResourceDefinition TestResource
When I update its status to DeploymentFailed
Then the failure reflects on the TestResource
And the failure event has been issued to Kubernetes

labels.name: feature
labels.value: As a controller developer, I would like perform common operations on the relevant Kubernetes resources through a simple interface to reduce the learning curve
